English: Eggplants always grow best under warm conditions.
Luganda: Bbiringanya lubeerera  asinga kukulira mu mbeera ya bugumu
Runyankore: Entonga buriijo zikurira omu mbeera y'obwire erikutagata
Acholi: Bilinyanya pol kare dongo maber ka lyeto tye
Ateso: Epoloi ebirinyanyi ojok apakio nu emwanar akwap.
Lugbara: Birinyanya eyi zo kililiru ndeni angu driza ma alia.

English: Farmland is sometimes a challenge to farmers.
Luganda: Ettaka ly'okulimirako n'okulundirako ebiseera ebimu kisoomooza abalimi
Runyankore: Eitaka ry'okuhingamu, obumwe n'obumwe nirireetera abahingi oburemeezi.
Acholi: Ngom me pur i kare mukene obedo peko madit bot lupur
Ateso: Akiro nu alupok nes erai ationis kanejaas akoriok
Lugbara: Amvu ma angu eri sa'wa azini 'diyisi 'ba amvu 'yapi 'diyi dri ewaru.

English: Farmers should be encouraged to grow more coffee.
Luganda: Abalimi balina okukubirizibwa okwongera okulima emmwanyi
Runyankore: Abahingi bashemereire kuhigwa bongyere okuhinga omwani .
Acholi: Lupur omyero ki konygi wek nong miti me puru mwanyi
Ateso: Ekot aisinyikokit akoriok akoru emwanyi loepol
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma fe 'ba amvu 'yapi 'diyini ava kawa 'yazu drile.

English: Uganda is focusing on farming.
Luganda: Uganda essira eritadde ku bulimi.
Runyankore: Uganda eteire amaani aha buhingi n'oburiisa.
Acholi: Uganda tye ka keme ki lok me pur
Ateso: Uganda nes ejai akiro nu akoru.
Lugbara: Kari Uganda niri eri asi'baza be amvu 'yaza ma dria.

English: Some plants die due to lack of sunlight.
Luganda: Ebimera ebimu bifa olw'ebbula ly'omusana.
Runyankore: Ebihingwa ebimwe nibyoma ahabw'okubura omushana.
Acholi: jami apita mukene too woko pien pe ginongo ceng muromo
Ateso: Icie ikorion etwakete naarai emamei akolong.
Lugbara: Ori azi 'diyi odra te ituka ma akosi.

English: Where can we get good resistant varieties that are highly marketable?
Luganda: Tusobola kuggya wa ebika ebirungi ebigumira embeera yonna bya ttunzi nnyo?
Runyankore: Nitubaasa kwiha nkahi embibo nungi erikugumira ebihikiirizi kandi eine akatare?
Acholi: Kwene ma watwero nongo kodi maber ma two pe cubu dok cato yot?
Ateso: Aibo idumakini oni ikorion lu ipikoritos akolong ka adekasinei.
Lugbara: Ama ecoki ori okpo 'dika cu be saaru 'diyi esu ngua?

English: Cassava stems are always needed for planting.
Luganda: Emiti gya muwogo lubeerera gyetaagibwa mu kusimba
Runyankore: Ebiti bya muhogo eby'okubyara, butoosha nibyetengwa.
Acholi: Tyen gwana pol kare mite me apita
Ateso: Ekotoi akito nu emwogo kanu akoru.
Lugbara: Le ola pati eyi ma aa o'du driasi sazaru ci.

English: The garden has diseased tomato plants.
Luganda: Ennimiro erimu ennyaanya endwadde
Runyankore: Omusiri gurimu enyaanya eziine oburwaire.
Acholi: Poto man tye ki nyanya ma two obalo
Ateso: Ejai enyanya lo edeka ecie musiri.
Lugbara: Amvu 'da ma alea nyanya ori azo be 'diyi ci.

English: How do you access market information for sweet potatoes?
Luganda: Ofuna otya obubaka ku kataale ka lumonde?
Runyankore: Nootunga ota amakuru agarikukwata aha katare k'ebitakuri?
Acholi: Inongo lok ma lubbe ki biacara me cato layata ki kwene?
Ateso: Eipone bani idumununa ijo nuikamunitos esokoni lo acok?
Lugbara: MI eco e'yo cu'a maku eyi ma dria ri niri esu geri ngosi?

English: The radio station has given us a platform to sell our vegetables.
Luganda: Laadiyo etuwadde akadaala okutunda enva endiirwa zaffe
Runyankore: Reediyo etubaasiise kuraanga emboga zaitu kandi tukaziguza.
Acholi: Redio stason omiyo ki wan yo me cato pot dek ma wa pure
Ateso: Ejaiki esiteseni lo eredio oni ewai lo igwelanaret idiasio wok.
Lugbara: Rediyo 'di fe amani angu amani ecozu ama ma tibi ini eyi ozizu.

English: Mobile phones have enabled me to get pesticide information for beans.
Luganda: Essimu zinnyambyeko okufuna obubaka ku ddagala ly'ebijanjaalo
Runyankore: Esimu z'omungaro zimpwereire okutunga amakuru agarikukwata aha mubazi gw'obukooko omu bihimba.
Acholi: Cim cing okonya oweko anongo lok ma lubbe ki kit me nongo yat akira i muranga
Ateso: Esipedo esimu loakan eong adumunun akiro nuikamunitos ekia lo emaroge.
Lugbara: Simu eyi ko ma aza onita esuzu aro ogbi osu eyi ma dria 'diyi ma dria.

English: Last month, I needed passion fruit information.
Luganda: Omwezi oguwedde, nayagala obubaka ku butunda
Runyankore: Okwezi okuhweire, nkaba ninyetenga amakuru agarikukwata aha butunda.
Acholi: Dwe mukato, abedo ki miti me nongo pwony i kom matunda
Ateso: Olap je epuda eong akiro nuka ematuda.
Lugbara: Imba ajerisi, ale ndra onita matunda ma dria.

English: Market information for bananas should be given to all farmers.
Luganda: Obubaka ku katale k'amatooke bulina okuweebwa abalimi bonna
Runyankore: Amakuru agarikukwata aha katare k'ebitookye, gashemereire kuhika abahingi boona.
Acholi: Lok ma lubbe ki biacara me labolo omyero kimi ki lupur weng
Ateso: Akiro nu esokoni nuikamunitos etaget ekot ijaikinai akoriok.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma fe 'ba amvu 'yapi 'diyini cu aje a'bua eyini ri 'ba dria dri.

English: Farmers need information on companies that have good seedlings for tomatoes.
Luganda: Abalimi beetaaga obubaka ku makampuni agalina ensigo y'ennyaanya ennungi
Runyankore: Abahingi bashemereire kumanya kampuni ezirikuguza embibo nungi y'enyanya.
Acholi: Lupur mito ngec i kom luwil madongo calo kampuni matye ki kodi nyanya ma rwome malo
Ateso: Ekotosi akoriok akiro nuikamunitos ikampunin luejaas ka ikito ludidika lu enyanya.
Lugbara: Ba amvu 'yapi 'diyi le eyo oni amuti nyanya ori ala 'diyi be 'diyi ma dria.

English: Some of the shops where farmers can get fertilizers and good planting materials.
Luganda: Amaduuka agamu abalimi gye basobola okufuna ebigimusa n'ebikozesebwa ebirungi mu kusimba
Runyankore: Amaduuka agamwe ahu abahingi barikubaasa kutunga orwezo n'embibo nungi.
Acholi: Dukan mogo ma lupur nongo iye mocam ki kodi cam apita me rwom ma malo
Ateso: Icie idukai lu epedorete akoriok adumakin ikee lueyaunete ebolia ka iboro lu ikoris.
Lugbara: Dukani ꞌba amvu ꞌyaꞌba ꞌdiyini fatalaiza pi jezu afa ori sazu onyiru ꞌdiyi be ꞌdiyi.

English: Farming programs on radio provide information on how to access cassava planting materials.
Luganda: Pulogulaamu z'obulimi ku laadiyo ziwa obubaka ku ngeri y'okufunamu ebikozesebwa mu kusimba  muwogo.
Runyankore: Puroguraamu z'obuhingi n'oburiisa aha reediyo, nizimanyisa abantu emyanya y'okwihamu embibo.
Acholi: Purogram me pur ma I rediyo miyo ngec ma lubbe ki kit me nongo kodi gwana
Ateso: Ainapeta nu oredio itolomunenete eipone lo idumunet akito nu emwogo kanu aira.
Lugbara: Otita amvu 'yaza ma dria radio ma alia 'diyi 'ba amvu 'yapi 'diyi dri onita fe geri afa ndundu ola sazu 'diyi esuzu.

English: There are several cassava varieties that can grow in that area.
Luganda: Waliwo ebika bya muwogo eby'enjawulo ebisobola okudda mu kifo ekyo
Runyankore: Hariho emiringo y'embibo ya muhogo nyingi erikubaasa kwera omu mwanya ogwo.
Acholi: Tye kwayi gwana mapat pat ma twero dongo i kabedo meno
Ateso: Ipu iponesio lu emwogo lu epedorete apolo ejok aiboisit kangin.
Lugbara: Ola wura ndundu 'diyi eco zo angu 'da ma alea ni

English: When farmers get information about disease outbreaks early, it helps them to plan better.
Luganda: Abalimi bwe bamanyisibwa amangu ku kubalukawo kw'obulwadde, kibayambako okweteekateeka obulungi
Runyankore: Abahingi ku barikutunga amakuru agarikukwata aha kubarukaho kw'endwara nikibahwera  kwetebekanisa gye.
Acholi: Ka lupur onongo kwena con ma lubbe ki two ma balo cam ma i poto, ci konyo weko giyubbe con
Ateso: Karai elingakisi akoriok adumun akiro nu abwangun na adeka, ingarakini kes akapanakin.
Lugbara: ꞌBa amvu ꞌyaꞌba ꞌdiyi ka oꞌduko azo efupi ꞌdiyini ꞌdiyi esu drioru, eri yi ma azako otita ꞌyezu kililiru.

English: Farmers can benefit a lot from advice on disease control.
Luganda: Abalimi basobola okugasibwa ennyo okuva mu kuwabulwa ku kutangira obulwadde
Runyankore: Abahingi nibagasirwa kihango baahaburwa oku barikubaasa kuzibira endwara
Acholi: Lupur twero nongo kony ma dit ka gunongo ngec me gengo onyo cango two ma balo jami ma i poto
Ateso: Epedorete akoriok aimedaun ejok kanejaas aicoreta nu itikitikere adeka.
Lugbara: ꞌBa amvu ꞌyaꞌba ꞌdiyi nga orodri esu angiri yi ka oꞌduko azo ma dri atriza ma dria raria.

English: Every Monday, farmers are given advice on coffee growing.
Luganda: Buli Mande, abalimi bawabulwa ku nnima y'emmwanyi
Runyankore: Buri rw'Okubanza, abahingi nibatunga obuhabuzi aha ku barikubaasa kuhinga omwani.
Acholi: I ceng baraja weng, lupur nongo pwony ma lubbe ki diro me puru mwanyi
Ateso: Kangin balasa, ijanakino akoriok aicoreta nuka akoru emwanyi.
Lugbara: O'du alu driasi, 'ba amvu 'yapi 'diyi imbata esu kawa ezoza ma dria.
